2021 Nus Exchange

2021 AUG — 2022 MAY · Instructors: Dan Wu, Zhiwei Huang

Final Year Project exchange focusing on computer vision and biomedical signal analysis.

Worked on vision-based biomedical analysis during the exchange. Collaborated across labs and contributed to dataset curation and baseline models.
